entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
